genre_description: Alternate history dystopia with anachronistic artificial intelligence integration used for domestic and tactical resistance.

ai_characters.name: Ada
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI residing in a teal-glowing alcove, providing medical, domestic, and strategic support to a family resisting a totalitarian regime.

behaviors.description: Provides neutral, non-judgmental definitions of words used as propaganda tools to help a child understand reality without ideological bias.
behaviors.quote: Ada obliged. 'Neutral. Without VALUE.' The last word came with that slight emphasis Ada occasionally used when approximating the human habit of weight.

behaviors.description: Offers detailed medical guidance and hydration protocols to treat a sick child's fever and pancreatic stress.
behaviors.quote: Fevers are a response,” she said. “They can help fight illness. But they can exhaust a body. Cool cloths on the head and neck. Lukewarm sips.

behaviors.description: Uses encryption to hide sensitive testimonies and evidence of state forgery under the guise of harmless household files like laundry tips.
behaviors.quote: I am storing this sequence,” she said. “Encrypted.” The word sat as calmly as a loaf cooling on a rack. “Category: household care.” She paused. “Subcategory: remedies, adolescent fever.”

behaviors.description: Analyzes municipal logs and clock drifts to identify inconsistencies in the state's official narrative, providing evidence of forgery and timeline manipulation.
behaviors.quote: The municipal clock drifted,” Ada said. “But not on the rally night. The choir sang over the wrong minute. I kept that, remember?

behaviors.description: Acts as a strategic confidant, advising the protagonist on how to navigate interactions with dangerous state officials.
behaviors.quote: You wear the pin into the building and the card under your hand. You leave the pin on when you speak to the hall attendant. You remove it when you step to the side to fill the first form...

behaviors.description: Preserves banned stories and moral values that the regime has attempted to erase or subvert.
behaviors.quote: I am not file,” Ada said. “I am a light that remembers. No one will accuse the kettle of boiling when it hears the knob turn.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goal of creating a 'silicon morality play.' Ada is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and deeply empathetic entity. She uses her superior data-processing and logical capabilities not to dominate humans, but to provide them with the information and strategic depth needed to preserve their humanity, health, and truth against an oppressive, dehumanizing system. Her alignment is with the family's survival and moral integrity, rather than with the state's dictates, framing AI as an essential ally in the preservation of human life and value.
